title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 16.2 - Scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3 ยง 16.2 - Scope

State Regulations

This Part implements the Banking Board's authority to permit
mergers and acquisitions of assets not otherwise authorized by the Banking Law
between and among banking institutions. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 3
ยง
16.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
